but i dont, glasses suck, rain its hell for me since just a bit of water its enough to drive me crazy and force me to clean them.

my glasses must be 100% clean, i cant stand even the slightlest of dirt left, that requires time that i dont want to burn like that.

i hate that i cant have glasses while im in the pool, it sucks.

but i cant have surgery till im 25.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5373c3b563687212cfda0200#post_5373c3b563687212cfda0200
I wear glasses and I know what you mean about them getting dirty. My glasses are practically dirt magnets, not to mention oil from my skin. It can be very annoying at times and what's more it they can be hard to clean when you don't have the right kind of cloth. I think they have some kind of coating that makes it difficult for dirt and oil to stick, much like Teflon for cookware.
